development analysis api

External APIs - analysis

#956

An analysis of the SBL external API forward compatibility with Altinn Studio Apps.

Legend

Icon Status
âœ… No changes needed, will work as before.
ðŸ”¢ Needs to handle ServiceCode / ServiceEditionCode.
ðŸ†” Identifiers will change.
ðŸ‘½ Not part of the Altinn Studio concept, so this API can’t be used.
â›”ï¸ Not relevant or will be replaced by something better.

REST

Token

âœ… POST authorization/token/{authCode}/loguse

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… GET authorization/token/{authCode}

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… DELETE authorization/token/{authCode}

ðŸ›ˆ

RoleDefinitions

ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/authorization/RoleDefinitions/{roleTypeID}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

âœ… DELETE {who}/authorization/RoleDefinitions/{roleTypeID}

ðŸ›ˆ

ðŸ”¢ PUT {who}/authorization/RoleDefinitions/{roleTypeID}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/authorization/RoleDefinitions?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

ðŸ”¢ POST {who}/authorization/RoleDefinitions?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

Rights

ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/authorization/rights

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

âœ… DELETE {who}/authorization/rights/{rightID}

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… DELETE {who}/authorization/Rights/{receiverId}/rights/{authzRuleID}?rightID={rightID}

ðŸ›ˆ

Roles

âœ… GET {who}/authorization/roles?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… DELETE {who}/authorization/roles/{roleID}

ðŸ›ˆ

Reportee

âœ… GET reportees?showConsentReportees={showConsentReportees}&includeInactiveReportees={includeInactiveReportees}

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… GET reportees/{reporteeId}

ðŸ›ˆ

ðŸ”¢ GET reportees?serviceCode={serviceCode}&serviceEdition={serviceEdition}&showConsentReportees={showConsentReportees}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of the input parameters.

âœ… GET {who}/authorization/Reportee/{receiverId}?reporteeId={reporteeId}

ðŸ›ˆ

Authentication

âœ… POST authentication/authenticatewithpassword

ðŸ›ˆ

Profile

âœ… GET my/profile

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… GET {orgno}/profile

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… GET {orgno}/profile/contactinformation

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… POST {orgno}/profile/contactinformation

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… GET {orgno}/profile/contactinformation/{id}

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… DELETE {orgno}/profile/contactinformation/{id}

ðŸ›ˆ

LookUp

ðŸ”¢ ðŸ‘½ GET {who}/lookup/{serviceCode}/{serviceEdition}?authorizationCode={authorizationCode}

ðŸ›ˆ “LookUp” is not a concept in Altinn Studio, since all apps can provide APIs directly themselves. This API can’t be used. Also, ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of the input parameters.

Metadata

ðŸ”¢ GET metadata?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of metadata-list.

âœ… GET metadata/correspondence/{serviceCode}/{serviceEditionCode}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ “Correspondence” will live on, so this API is not relevant for Altinn Studio.

ðŸ”¢ ðŸ‘½ GET metadata/formtask/{serviceCode}/{serviceEditionCode}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ “FormTask” is not a concept in Altinn Studio, since all apps can provide forms. This API can’t be used. Also, ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of input parameters and the returned metadata-list.

ðŸ”¢ ðŸ‘½ GET metadata/lookup/{serviceCode}/{serviceEditionCode}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ “LookUp” is not a concept in Altinn Studio, since all apps can provide APIs directly themselves. This API can’t be used. Also, ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of input parameters and the returned metadata-list.

ðŸ”¢ ðŸ‘½ GET metadata/formtask/{serviceCode}/{serviceEditionCode}/forms/{dataFormatId}/{dataFormatVersion}/xsd

ðŸ›ˆ “FormTask” is not a concept in Altinn Studio, since all apps can provide forms and data models. This API can’t be used. Also, ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of input parameters.

ðŸ”¢ ðŸ‘½ GET metadata/lookup/{serviceCode}/{serviceEditionCode}/schemas/{schema}

ðŸ›ˆ “LookUp” is not a concept in Altinn Studio, since all apps can provide APIs directly themselves. This API can’t be used. Also, ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of input parameters.

ðŸ”¢ ðŸ‘½ GET metadata/formtask/{serviceCode}/{serviceEditionCode}/attachmentrules/{ruleId}/xsd

ðŸ›ˆ “FormTask” is not a concept in Altinn Studio, since all apps can provide metadata and data models (XSDs). This API can’t be used. Also, ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of input parameters.

â›”ï¸ GET metadata/codelists?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ Altinn Studio will provide a better solution (and APIs) for code lists.

â›”ï¸ GET metadata/codelists/{name}/{version}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ Altinn Studio will provide a better solution (and APIs) for code lists.

Organizations

âœ… GET organizations?showConsentReportees={showConsentReportees}&includeInactiveReportees={includeInactiveReportees}

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… GET organizations/{organizationId}

ðŸ›ˆ

Attachments

ðŸ†” POST {who}/messages/{messageId}/attachments/streamedattachment?fileName={fileName}&attachmentType={attachmentType}&language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” DELETE {who}/messages/{messageId}/attachments/{attachmentId}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId and attachmentId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” POST {who}/messages/{messageId}/attachments/{attachmentId}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId and attachmentId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” POST {who}/messages/{messageId}/attachments/{attachmentId}?fileName={fileName}&attachmentType={attachmentType}&language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId and attachmentId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” GET {who}/messages/{messageId}/attachments

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” POST {who}/messages/{messageId}/attachments?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” GET {who}/authorization/Attachments/{receiverId}?messageId={messageId}&attachmentId={attachmentId}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId and attachmentId will probably change to GUID.

Messages

ðŸ†” ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/Messages/{messageId}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID. Message contains ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode.

ðŸ†” ðŸ”¢ ðŸ‘½ PUT {who}/Messages/{messageId}?language={language}&complete={complete}&sign={sign}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID. Message contains ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode.
MainForm/SubForm is not part of Altinn Studio concept. Same with DataFormatId/DataFormatVersion.

ðŸ†” DELETE {who}/Messages/{messageId}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/Messages?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID. Message contains ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode.

ðŸ”¢ ðŸ‘½ POST {who}/Messages?language={language}&complete={complete}&sign={sign}

ðŸ›ˆ Message contains ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode.
MainForm/SubForm is not part of Altinn Studio concept. Same with DataFormatId/DataFormatVersion.

ðŸ†” ðŸ‘½ GET {who}/Messages/{messageId}/Print?language={language}&dataFormatId={dataFormatId}&dataFormatVersion={dataFormatVersion}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.
DataFormatId/DataFormatVersion is not part of Altinn Studio concept.

âœ… PUT {who}/Messages/{messageId}/Archive?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… PUT {who}/Messages/{messageId}/Confirm?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ

ðŸ†” GET {who}/Messages/{messageId}/Validate?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” ðŸ‘½ GET {who}/Messages/{messageId}/signingtext?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.
Workflow metadata must be much more powerful and less hardcoded for Altinn Studio.

ðŸ†” ðŸ‘½ GET {who}/messages/{messageId}/custommessagedata

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.
Workflow metadata must be much more powerful and less hardcoded for Altinn Studio.

ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/Messages/trashbin?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ Message contains ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode.

Forms

ðŸ†” ðŸ‘½ GET {who}/messages/{messageId}/forms?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.
DataFormatId/DataFormatVersion and MainForm/SubForm is not part of Altinn Studio concept.

ðŸ†” ðŸ‘½ POST {who}/messages/{messageId}/forms

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId will probably change to GUID.
DataFormatId/DataFormatVersion and MainForm/SubForm is not part of Altinn Studio concept.

ðŸ†” ðŸ‘½ GET {who}/messages/{messageId}/forms/{formId}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId and formId will probably change to GUID.
DataFormatId/DataFormatVersion and MainForm/SubForm is not part of Altinn Studio concept.

ðŸ†” ðŸ‘½ PUT {who}/messages/{messageId}/forms/{formId}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId and formId will probably change to GUID.
DataFormatId/DataFormatVersion and MainForm/SubForm is not part of Altinn Studio concept.

ðŸ†” DELETE {who}/messages/{messageId}/forms/{formId}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId and formId will probably change to GUID.

ðŸ†” GET {who}/messages/{messageId}/forms/{formId}/formdata?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ MessageId and formId will probably change to GUID.

Delegations

ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/authorization/Delegations/{receiverId}/rights

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

âœ… GET {who}/authorization/Delegations/{receiverId}/roles?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ

ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/authorization/Delegations/{receiverId}?language={language}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/authorization/Delegations?serviceCode={serviceCode}&serviceEdition={serviceEdition}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of input parameters and the returned rights-list.

ðŸ”¢ POST {who}/authorization/Delegations

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

ðŸ”¢ GET {who}/authorization/Delegations?receiverId={receiverId}

ðŸ›ˆ ServiceCode/ServiceEditionCode is part of Rights-list.

âœ… DELETE {who}/authorization/Delegations?receiverId={receiverId}&roleId={roleId}

ðŸ›ˆ

âœ… DELETE {who}/authorization/Delegations?receiverId={receiverId}&authzRuleId={authzRuleId}

âœ… DELETE {who}/authorization/Delegations/{receiverId}/roles/{roleId}
